title: ONE Championship 100, Part 1 video highlights with Demetrious Johnson's title, Angela Lee
text:
Former longtime UFC flyweight champion Demetrious Johnson has a new belt in a new organization.

Johnson won ONE Championship’s flyweight tournament this past Saturday with a dominant decision over Danny Kingad at ONE Championship 100’s first of two shows. In addition, Angela Lee defended her atomweight title against Jing Nan Xiongand her brother, Christian Lee, won the lightweight tournament final against Saygid Guseyn Arslanaliev.

Check out all the highlights from that card in the video above. And don’t miss the highlights from ONE Championship 100, Part 2, as well.
description: Check out the video highlights from ONE Championship 100, Part 1.
